WaniKani_Meaning_Mnemonic: The hand radical and the hand kanji are identical in looks and meaning! That should make things easy!
WaniKani_Meaning_Info: Make sure you're studying your radicals. It won't be forever that radicals and kanji overlap so nicely like this!
WaniKani_Reading_Mnemonic: To remember the reading ã¦ we will use the word "Television." You have great hands. Go ahead and look at them. OH MY GOD. You have little televisions (ã¦) on your hands. They are playing the dumbest show you can think of, too, both hands at the same time.
WaniKani_Reading_Info: You try to shake your hands off, but it's no good. The televisions are stuck, and the volume won't go down. You have no idea how you got these televisions on your hands. All you know is that you want them off right this instant.

humanum_full_description_en:
" hand " generally make Oracle " and " I saw three fingers, due to " turn " and more to borrow as a conjunction, so another made " hand " word. The " hands " in the bronze inscriptions often have five fingers, which are like five fingers to arms. " Hand " and " stop " (" toe " or " foot ") are the most important parts of Chinese characters. "Said Wen": "Hand, boxing. Pictogram. All hands belong to the hand. ğ ‚¿, ancient Chinese hand." The shape of the word " hand " is similar to "æ¯›", the two are easy to confuse, see "æ¯›". In addition, the ancient text of "Shuowen" is similar to the bamboo slips of the Warring States period. You can refer to "Shangbo Bamboo Book Seven." Why should a gentleman be safe and secure in Jiaben" in 9-character form.

Bronze " hand " is used as the original meaning, referring to a person's hand, and the lid of the pot: "Waiting hands ğ©’¨shou." Zhou Shu. "Zhaogao" is called "Beishou Jishou". "Bai Shou Ji Shou" is the ancient ritual of kneeling, that is, bowing to hands and bowing to the ground. Also, the word can pass off as " first ," Mao cover: "Mao worship hand page (ğ©’¨) hand (first)." "Kowtow" written "page hand" only this one chapter, see " page ." In addition, Wang Chengui said: "Wang Chen's hand is to call the head." The other device is "Bai Jishou", and " hand " is a typo in " Wai ".

The " hand " in the bamboo slips of the Warring States period is also used as the original meaning, referring to the hand of a person, "Guodian Chujian. "Five Elements" Jane 45: "Ears, eyes, nose, mouth, hands, feet." Also "Shangbo Bamboo Book VII. Why should a gentleman be safe in Jiaben" Jane 8 to 9: "Jie (Jie), Shou (çº£), You, Wan (Li) ğ£© (slaughter) died by human hands."

" Hand " in handed down literature is also mostly used as the original meaning, such as "Poetry. Bei Feng. "Drumming": "Hold the hand of the child, and grow old with the child." " Hand " is derived from the hand of a person to have the meaning of holding. Yu Yue's "Ancient Suspicious Examples" Volume 3: "Holding is a hand. ""Yi Zhou Shu. "Ke Yin": "The King Wu is Taibai in his hand to command the princes." The whole sentence refers to the King Wu holding the Taibai flag in his hand to command the princes.

In addition, small and exquisite objects that are easy to carry are often described by " hands ", such as "hand folds", "manuals" and so on. "History of Ming Dynasty. "Qi Tai Biography": "I also asked the books and books, and published the manual for advancement."
